st:Description.name: LocalStorage
st:Description.st:role: Setting to handle the local persistency location for PLM local storage stream/unstream operations
st:Description.st:detailedRole: This setting allows to customize the location of local storage persistency operations on authoring extended streams

st:attribute.Name: LSManagedPath
st:attribute.st:role: Root path for the Local Storage managed directory
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: This option specifies the repository path on a local disk storing locally stored result streams.
